segments.text: I am observing a kitchen scene, quite a busy one actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink, completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is sheeting down the cabinet doors and forming a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, meticulously drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot is already submerged in the water, yet she shows absolutely no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her gaze is fixed solely on that plate, as if nothing else exists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is wide open, just pouring water out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe her level of concentration on such a simple task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so serene through the window, a stark contrast to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is just getting worse by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR
